data.title: Apple Store for Government
data.text:
Shop for your agency

Apple for Federal Government

Apple provides many purchasing options to meet the needs of Federal Government customers

Learn more

Apple Store for State and Local Government

This store is designed exclusively for State and Local Government customers to purchase Apple and third party products using a procurement card.

Shop now

Shop for yourself

Federal Government Employees

Federal Government employees can purchase select Apple products and third-party solutions for themselves and their immediate family members at a special price. Note, this program is for personal use only and not intended for purchases using agency funds.

Shop now

State & Local Government Employees

State and Local Government employees can purchase select Apple products and third-party solutions for themselves and their immediate family members at a special price. Note, this program is for personal use only and not intended for purchases using agency funds.

Shop now
